checklistItems.lineItemDescription: Deal Pipeline created in Deal Center
Tamesek / Related Party checks completed
Conflicts Clearance Request submitted and approved on Deal Center
Conditions imposed by Control Room have been implemented / followed up
Transactions falling outside the coverage of PPG or Country Addendum approved
SF Only - Sanctions check completed
Assess CDD/ GIC status of the client legal entity which is engaging / mandating us
Approval for use of Intermediaries completed
Execution of Non-Disclosure/ Confidentiality Agreement
Any Exclusivity Agreement must be signed and approved by the relevant delegated authority
PSR Approved on Deal Center (including Volcker Checks)
Public Market Deal Approval obtained on Deal Center
Deal Approval from Group Head Corporate Finance
Syndications - Indicative pricing and sell down requirements agreed
Operating lease with extension and/or options - interest rate risks is hedged
Credit Pre-Approval
Policy exceptions approved by Credit
Country Risk Approval
Non Presence Country Policy / Restricted Jurisdications related approvals obtained
Licensing and Marketing Guidelines (LMG) requirements for the deal been met
Onshore/Offshore Screening confirmation from Compliance on Deal Center
Engage International Balance Sheet Management (IBSM) / GOBPM for Booking Location finalisation
Seek approval for SCB parental support /guarantee (where applicable)
Restricted list updated and public transaction requirements followed
Obtain confirmation of locked-in Liquidity Premium from ALM and/or funding details from Structured Solutions (where applicable)
Engagement Letter Issued
Engagement Letter Signed
Wall-crossing of external parties performed
Mandate Letter/ Commitment letter / Term sheet signed by Client
Credit Approval - BCA approved
Time bound covenants and rist triggers are captured in CaRT Module and tagged to coorect CF Transactors
UWS Checklist completed and included in BCA pack
Client Level ESRAT Completed  by RM
Transaction Level ESRAT Completed
FATCA analysis completed and relevant clauses included in facility agreement
Deal Due Diligence Completed
Product/Business committee approval(s) obtained
Country committee approval(s) obtained
BRRRC approval
Fairness Opinion approved
Public Transaction Cash Confirmation
FI has prepared BCA for Standard Chartered lease Group Limited and allocated lines to SCB SPV.
Prepare Investment Memorandum (IM)
Organize call with sufficient quorum,  and circulate for approval from:
Obtain approval from a. Board of Standard Chartered Lease Group Limited; and b. Board of Marina Leasing Limited.
Submit Changes to Group Corporate Structure Approval Form for approval (and Project Approval Request "PAR” where a large capital injection is going into a subsidiary or SPV)
Obtain credit approval on any sub-bareboat lease provisions that are granted to lessees.
Obtain market risk approvals
Obtain technical accounting approval on accounting treatment  (copy Stan Barnes in emails with technical accountants)
Legal counsel appointment approval obtained on Deal Center
Legal Sign-off to facility documentation (Nutcracker Transaction checklist) and legal opinions
SF Only - Communicate any insurance requirements to client
Agency's sign off obtained on the finance and security documents where SCB is acting as a Faciltiy Agent and/or Security Agent
Lending Documentation Unit (LDU) has reviewed and confirmed that execution version is in order for execution by SCB signatory
Obtain MII/MAP/Innocent Owners Insurance (as applicable)
Obtain draft Insurance opinion (if applicable). For operating lease deals, ensure insurance premiums are approved by legal
Jurisdiction questionnaire completed / updated
Search for Aircraft/ Vessel Sanctions (Note: Positive ID of aircraft/ vessel to be escalated to FCC Sanctions):
Facility agreements executed
Confirmation from RM/ GAM that relevants accounts are open
CP Satisfaction Letter reviewed by CDU / confirmation that CPs are met
ALM funding loan structures of SPVs  are sufficient for dividend payments at the end of each year.
Final draft of documentation sent to Pembroke
Security Compliance Certificate (SCC) / PSCC/ DDN issued
Fee Booking Form approved by Product Control (PC) / Tax
BCA Part 1 updated to include time bound covenants within the earlier of - 30 days of facility execution, 14 days of SCC issuance (or vessel delivery for SF)
PAM Handover Complete
Deal status marked as complete
Close Conflicts Clearance on Deal Centre
Client consent has been obtained for use of client name/logo in deal tombstone advertisements, awards pitches etc
Lease Handover to Pembroke complete
Ensure SPV details updated on Blueprint
Signed agreements and legal documents to be sent to relevant operations teams (LDU, CDU, Loans&Agency or Security Trustee, etc as applicable).
